str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
Prolongation from a primary verb, another form of which, matheo, is used as an alternate in certain tenses; to learn.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To interrogate, question, demand of. From epi and erotao; to ask for, i.e. Inquire, seek.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Base, disgraceful. From the same as aischunomai; shameful, i.e. Base.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From a compound of ek and a derivative of kaleo; a calling out, i.e. a popular meeting, especially a religious congregation.
